articles.author: Wesley Yin-Poole
articles.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Will Be Playable in September 2025… at an Australian Museum - IGN
articles.description: IGN can reveal the hotly anticipated Hollow Knight: Silksong will be playable in an Australian museum in September 2025. But what does that mean for the actual release date?
articles.content:
IGN can reveal the Hollow Knight: Silksong will be playable in an Australian museum in September 2025.
